roleset.name: reduce greatly

example.name: typical usage
example.text: The action followed by one day an Intelogic announcement that it-1 will retain an investment banker *trace*-1 to explore alternatives ``*trace*-1 to minimize shareholder value,'' including the possible sale of the company.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'minimize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Adjectival 'minimal' added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8.
